author: Zusha Elinson
title: The Wall Street Journal: Gun background checks hit new record in March, triggered by coronavirus fears
description: The number of gun background checks hit an all-time high in March as panicked Americans rushed to buy firearms during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
The number of gun background checks hit an all-time high in March as panicked Americans rushed to buy firearms during the coronavirus pandemic.
The Federal Bureau of Investigation performed an estimated 2.375 million background checks for gun sales, the reco… [+1103 chars]
